name: Eggilicious Meatloaf with Sun-dried Tomato Relish
description: An eggy twist on a family classic!

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or French Onion Dip Mix
lean ground beef, chicken or turkey

preparation:
1. Combine all relish ingredients in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for about 15 minutes to thicken and let flavours blend.
  2. Preheat oven to 375° F (190° C).
  3. For the meatloaf, whisk eggs with milk in a large bowl. Stir in breadcrumbs and Seasoning for Meatballs & Meatloaf. Crumble in beef and season with Sea Salt. Mix well.
  4. Divide meat mixture into 6 equal portions. Place 3 portions on Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper. Shape and flatten each into a small rectangle. Make a dip in each and place 1 hard-cooked egg in centre. Cover each with remaining meat portions and press edges together to form mini loaves.
  5. Bake in centre of oven 30–35 minutes, until an instant-read thermometer registers an internal temperature of 160° F (71° C). Let stand 5 minutes, then slice.
  6. Serve with Sun-dried Tomato Relish.
